pages.text: Most items in this mod require rituals to craft.$(br)You will need $(l:items/7_ritual)Ritual Matrix and Ritual Altars$(/l).$(br2)The Ritual Altars must be placed within $(9)3 blocks$() of the Ritual Matrix, and the connection is successful when you see glyphs float toward the matrix.$(br2)To begin the ritual, place the required items on the matrix and altars, then right-click the matrix with a $(9)wand$().

pages.name: Ritual Setup
pages.text: Simply place the altars around the matrix, the diagram above is $(9)for reference only$().
